name: Murder Mystery Games LTD
tag_list: entertainment, games, online-games, party-games, murder-mystery-party-games, murder-mystery-games
description: Online Murder Mystery Games for parties
overview:
Murder Mystery Games, was one of the first online providers of Murder Mystery Game, party kits on the internet beginning in 1998, offering their party games via PDF download.

The company has designed some of the greatest murder games of their genre and - after selling a game to the International Antartica Expedition - can honestly say that they have sold on every continent via the web!

The company’s murder mustery games runs from just six to a massive 200 guests. All the games are delivered by PDF files, so you can start preparing the games for your guests within minutes of ordering online.

There is a US (dollar) site and a UK (pound) site.
